challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: You should have a new .left-container p selector.
Your new .left-container p selector should have a margin property set to -5px -2px.
Your new .left-container p selector should have a font-size property set to 2em.
Your new .left-container p selector should have a font-weight property set to 700.

description: Create a new .left-container p selector setting the top and bottom margin to -5px, and the left and right margin to -2px. Also set the font-size to 2em and font-weight to 700.
